Title: The Cooler
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Cole Sanchez, Andy Ristaino, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Dee Bradley Baker, Maria Bamford
Plot: Flame Princess asks Princess Bubblegum for help when her city is cooled down.
